app_description.message: Extension to use credentials saved in Hashicorp Vault.

ui_placeholder_unwrap_hash.message: Paste the shared credential hash here.

ui_placeholder_input_search.message: Name or part of the credential's name

ui_placeholder_input_username.message: Your vault user, eg: john.doe or email

ui_label_input_password_generator_size.message: Number of characters in the password

ui_placeholder_input_wrap_key.message: Enter the key name, e.g: password

ui_placeholder_input_wrap_value.message: Enter the key value, e.g: abc123@

ui_label_input_wrap_json.message: Key(s) and Value(s) in JSON format

ui_tooltip_toggle_password_view.message: Click to show or hide the password.

ui_tooltip_generate_random_password.message: Click to generate a random password.

ui_tooltip_generate_random_token.message: Click to generate a random token.

ui_message_fill_credentials_success.message: The credential was successfully inserted on the page.

ui_message_fill_token_success.message: The token was successfully inserted on the page.

ui_confirm_delete_secret.message:
Are you sure you want to delete the credential:

'$1'?

This action cannot be undone.

error_form_field_invalid.message: The value '$2' is not valid for the field '$1'.

error_form_password_size_invalid.message: The password must be at least $1 characters long.

error_password_generator_option_required.message: At least one option needs to be selected.

error_password_generator_size_not_a_numb.message: The number of characters must be a number.

error_password_generator_size_out_of_ran.message: Accepted values for the number of characters are between $1 and $2.

error_unwrap_hash_format_invalid.message: The hash is not in the correct format.

error_wrap_data_format_invalid_json.message: The inserted content is not a valid JSON.

error_wrap_ttl_not_a_number.message: The expiration time must be a valid number.

error_wrap_ttl_out_of_range.message: The expiration time should be between 1 and $1 minutes (24 hours).

error_api_invalid_endpoint.message: Endpoint must be a valid URL.

error_vault_endpoint_required.message: Vault address must be provided for the Vault API client.

error_vault_token_date_invalid.message: Invalid or missing token expiration date. Received expiration date: $1.

error_vault_logout_failed.message: Failed to logout. Please try again.

error_vault_unwrap_failed.message: The hash was not found or has already been used.

error_vault_permission_denied.message: Permission denied to access Vault resource.

error_vault_rate_limited.message: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.

error_page_fill_credentials_failed.message: Failed to insert credential on page.

error_page_fill_token_failed.message: Failed to insert token on page.

error_browser_query_tab_failed.message: Failed to access current tab information.

error_crypto_not_supported.message: The password generation library is not supported by your browser.

error_crypto_method_not_implemented.message: The method '$1' must be implemented by the subclass.

error_crypto_null_value.message: The encrypted value cannot be null.

error_crypto_unsupported_version.message: The '$1' encryption version is not supported.

log_vault_token_lookup_parse_error.message: Vault getCurrentToken: Failed to parse JSON response.

log_vault_header_missing_token.message: Warning: Attempting to create Vault header without a valid client_token.

config_page_scan_username_selectors.description: The name*='string' can select all inputs whose searched attribute contains the string. The 'i' is for case insensitivity.
config_page_scan_username_selectors.message: input[name*='usuario' i],input[name*='user' i],input[name*='username' i],input[name*='user_name' i],input[name*='login' i],input[name*='userid' i],input[name*='email' i],input[name*='mail' i],input[name*='cpf' i],input[name*='accesskey' i],input[name*='accountId' i],input[type='email' i],input[type='text' i]

config_page_scan_token_selectors.message: input[name*='token' i],input[name*='key' i],input[name*='chave' i],input[name*='accesskey' i],input[name*='accountId' i],input[type='password' i],input[type='text' i]

error_promise_pool_invalid_items.message: PromisePool: items must be an array.

error_promise_pool_invalid_function.message: PromisePool: asyncFn must be a function.

error_promise_pool_invalid_concurrency.message: PromisePool: concurrency must be a positive integer.
